examples: Her garden was a cool pleasant place to sit.
I'm looking for a place to live.

definitions.definition: a suitable area, building, situation, or occasion:
examples: University is a great place for making new friends.

definitions.definition: to put something in a particular position:
examples: She placed the letter in front of me.

definitions.definition: to arrange to have an advertisement, bet, order, etc.:
examples: We placed the order for the furniture six weeks ago.

definitions.definition: to give something emphasis, importance, etc.:
examples: She placed the emphasis on the word "soon" in order to make sure was understood.
The students are placed in/with companies for a period of work experience.
